title: Facebook, Fake News, and Democracy
description: Sam talks to journalist Max Read about his recent New York Magazine cover story, "Does Mark Zuckerberg Know What Facebook Is?"  Max writes about Facebook's role in the 2016 election as the company grapples how to handle  fake news, free speech, and political advertising. Email the show at samsanders@npr.org and follow Sam on Twitter @samsanders.
